tr.td: Wittenberg wins toss, Wittenberg defers, Kenyon defends south endzone
Will Gingery kickoff 61 yards to the KENF04, Brandon Byrd return 14 yards to the KENF18 (Michael Ford).
Thomas Merkle pass complete to Brian Hunca for 6 yards to the KENF24, out-of-bounds.
Rob Meagher rush for 8 yards to the KENF32 (Dustin Holmes; Keenan Wilson).
